item.title: Awards and Achievements

item.title: Key Courses
item.description: Postgraduate:> Postgraduate: Linear Algebra and its Applications Data Mining and Machine Learning Design and Analysis of Algorithms Distributed Computing and Big Data Mathematical Methods – Analysis Probability and Statistics with R Programming and Data Structures with Python Visualization (with R) RDBMS and SQL Undergraduate:> Undergraduate: Probability and Probability Distributions Linear Models Statistical Inference Econometrics Regression Analysis Survey Sampling Statistical Quality Control Time Series Analysis Stochastic Processes Operational Research (OR) Real Analysis Metric Space Linear Algebra Design of Experiments Online Courses ( DeepLearning.

item.title: Positions of Responsibility
item.description: PREDICT Presidency University Statistics Society:> PREDICT Presidency University Statistics Society: Social Media Manager, PR Team> Social Media Manager, PR Team – Tried to promote a statistical community to help each other grow, develop and enrich ourselves collectively.

item.title: Skills
